```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(luftr)
```

```{r}


home.data.long.5mins <- home.data.long %>% 
  mutate(Time = as.POSIXct(round(as.double(Time)/(5*60))*(5*60),
                                  origin=(as.POSIXct('1970-01-01')))) %>% 
  group_by(Time, Variable) %>% 
  mutate(Value = mean(Value, na.rm = T))

home.data.long.day <- home.data.long %>% 
  mutate(Time = as.Date(Time)) %>% 
  group_by(Time, Variable) %>% 
  mutate(Value = mean(Value, na.rm = T))
```


```{r}
p <- home.data.long %>% 
  filter(Variable %in% c("Time", "SDS_P1", "SDS_P2", "Temp", "Humidity")) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Time, y = Value)) +
  geom_line() +
  expand_limits(y = 0) +
  facet_wrap(~Variable, scales = "free_y")
p  
```
